name: ascii-frog
description: ASCII Frog Generator - Orchestrator package for frontend and backend

scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install --loglevel=http && cd ../backend && npm install --loglevel=http
scripts.install:all: npm install --loglevel=http && cd frontend && npm install --loglevel=http && cd ../backend && npm install --loglevel=http
scripts.predev: npm install --loglevel=http && cd frontend && npm install --loglevel=http && cd ../backend && npm install --loglevel=http && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.version:patch: npm run version:frontend && npm run version:backend
